name: Try of a level for DooM
description: Nothing of special, you're located inside a abandoned base full of hostile life (obviously),and you got to destroy the satan's fortress... in the second level you're inside a alien starship (well, this is the idea) and defeat the alien boss.... So, THE SAME OLD STORY! ^_^ Maybe, i'll made of this levels a episode for ZDOOM, but i don't know... This is my first level... please be good whit me...
